lines: Roaring fires! Malt beer! Ripe meat off the bone!
Dwarven ale is the finest drink in all Middle-earth!
The wealth of the Dwarves is surpassed by no other race.
What tidings do you bring from the world of Men, #p?
My beard is the envy of all Durin's Folk.
The smith-skill of the Dwarves is unmatched!
Our women are so alike in voice and appearance that they are often mistaken for our men.
Our men say that we women are so alike in voice and appearance as to be mistaken for men ourselves! Perhaps if they looked up from the smithy once in a while...
Welcome to the Iron Hills, #p! Many riches await you here.
These hills are rich with iron, and other minerals besides.
We have many mines in these hills.
You're a bit too tall for these mines, #p! Ha! Ha!
Do you have news from our folk in the West?
Well met!
Well met, #p!
Let us drink together!
Shall we drink, #p?
You are not one of the Khazâd, #p, but you seem friendly enough.
You may not be one of the Khazâd, #p, but you are always welcome in our halls.
By my beard, I've not seen a Man in all my life! Welcome to my home, #p!
Stature you may have, but a fine beard you have not!
You need to work on that beard, #p.
You may come of the race of Men, #p, but I've heard even Men can grow beards if they try! So where's yours? Ha! Ha!
No beard? I almost mistook you for an Elf.
I see you've been working on that beard, #p!
I see you are working on your beard. May it grow ever longer!
A fine beard you have underway there! Ha! Ha!
Stature you may have... and a beard on the way, it seems, but you have some growing to come yet!
Don't worry, #p. A beard like mine takes time to grow!
Is that the beginning of a beard I see upon your chin, #p? Did you heed my advice?
Stature you have, and a fine beard to go with it! Well grown, #p!
A most respectable beard you have, #p. Scarcely shorter than my own! Ha! Ha!
I never thought I'd see the day when one of the race of Men grew a beard to rival mine own!
My dear friend #p, with a beard full-grown? I scarcely recognised you!
A fine beard indeed, #p, and may it grow ever longer!
Who said the race of Men could not grow beards! You've done a fine job, #p!
There is some good stonework here.
Don't expect to get the better of me, you rowdy lad!
You are no match for the kinsmen of Durin!
You should not have come here, #p!
I'll cleave your miserable skull in twain!
Come on, lad! Show me what you've got!
Suffer the wrath of the Dwarves, #p!
Came you here only to be crushed?
Draw your last breath, #p!
No Dwarven ale for you!
Raaarrrgh!
I'll crush you like a rock, lad!
You have underestimated us, #p!
You're a nasty piece of work, #p!
What were you thinking, picking a fight with me? Ha!
Woe and ruin upon you and your kin, #p!
Khazâd ai-mênu!
May you roast in dragon-fire!
Had you a beard, I would tear it from your chin!
Is this what passes for a warrior among beardless folk?
Come here, you beardless wretch!
You couldn't grow a beard if you tried!
You stink like a pack of Rakhâs!
How dare you enter our lands?
You will pay for trespassing here!
Out with you, Morgul-scum!
Begone, Rukhs-scum!
Run back to the Rakhâs you serve!
You will pay for trespassing here, Morgul-scum!
